question:
Nadine : "..... mango or pineapple?"    Angel   : "I like pineapple."

Fill in the blank, with correct question is .....

a.

Which one

b.

Which one Angel likes

c.

Which fruit do you like

d.

Choose

​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Mungkin c (which fruit do you like) kak

related_questions.question:
Tuliskan manfaat air yang ditemukan ditempat tempat berikut!    A. Tanah
B. Sumur
C. Laut 
D. Sungai​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

A. Air Tanah berfungsi Memenuhi berbagai keperluan rumah tangga, seperti mandi, memasak, minum, dan mencuci. Irigasi pertanian, pada sawah petani yang letaknya jauh dari sumber air seperti pada sungai umumnya kemudian akan membuat sumur bor untuk mencukupi berbagai kebutuhan air tanaman pertanian.

B. fungsi air sumur

1. Meminimalisir Genangan Air Hujan

2. mengurangi risiko banjir

3. menambah cadangan air tanah

Penjelasan:

maaf cuma segini, selebihnya cari di google ya kak

related_questions.question: 2 Mention three the functions modal verbs of CAN and COULD!    Write down three sentences of CAN and COULD​

Read the paragraph below.    Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep
b. it's too painful for him too 
sleep
c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep
d. the paint is painful too to sleep
e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Read the paragraph below.

Rudi and his classmates played basketball earlier in the morning at school. Many students watched them. The game was exciting before an accident happened. Unfortunately, Rudi injured his ankle. He fell on the court. His friends took him to the school clinic. Later in the night, he can barely sleep. ....

The best sentence to complete the paragraph is ....

a. he is hurtful enough to sleep

b. it's too painful for him too

sleep

c. it's enough hurtful for him too sleep

d. the paint is painful too to sleep

e. he ankle is enough hurt too sleep

Penjelasan:

di atas jawapin ya

Baca paragraf di bawah ini.

Rudi dan teman-teman sekelasnya bermain basket pagi-pagi sekali di sekolah. Banyak siswa yang memperhatikan mereka. Pertandingan berlangsung seru sebelum kecelakaan terjadi. Sayangnya, Rudi

Buatlah tentang benda, binatang, orang atau tempat ( participant secara umum)    Lebih disukai yg terkait dengan teknologi. 
Kalau yg dibicarakan benda lebih menyoroti fungsi benda tsb. (yang pembuatannya merujuk dengan Report text)

□Bhs.inggris□​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

I have a smartphone. It is one of many sophisticated things that I've ever had. I use my smartphone to communicate with my family and friends. I don't have any game apps in my smartphone because I don't like to play games with my smartphone. I just like to watch youtube videos and tik tok videos on my smartphone. I also use my smartphone to communicate with google assistant. I enjoy communicating with that artificial intelligence because it's really cool! I can also practice speaking English with my google assistant. I feel happy to have my smartphone. Thank you.

Penjelasan:

Aku memiliki sebuah telepon pintar. Telpon pintarku adalah salah satu dari banyak hal canggih yang pernah kumiliki. Aku menggunakan smartphoneku untuk berkomunikasi dengan keluarga dan teman-temanku. Aku tidak memiliki aplikasi game di smartphoneku karena aku tidak suka bermain game dengan smartphoneku. Aku hanya suka menonton video youtube dan video tik tok di smartphoneku. Aku juga menggunakan smartphoneku untuk berkomunikasi dengan google asisten. Aku senang berkomunikasi dengan kecerdasan buatan tersebut karena sangat keren! Aku juga bisa berlatih berbicara bahasa Inggris dengan google asistenku. Aku merasa senang memiliki smartphoneku. Terima kasih.

Semoga membantu ya.
